beatles.name: The Beatles: Live At the Hollywood Bowl
beatles.description: Captures the band's three sold-out concerts at Los Angeles in 1964 and 1965.

bruce.name: Chapter and Verse
bruce.description: Chapter and Verse is the audio companion to Bruce Springsteen's autobiography, Born to Run.

pets.name: Secret Life of Pets
pets.description: Action/adventure comedy taking a hilarious look into the lives of Pets.

zootopia.name: Zootopia
zootopia.description: Animated comedy-adventure set in the modern mammal metropolis of Zootopia.

xmen.name: X-Men: Apocalypse
xmen.description: Professor X and Raven lead a team of young X-Men to stop their seemingly invincible nemesis from destroying mankind.

50shades.name: 50 Shades of Grey
50shades.description: A GoodReads Choice Awards Finalist for Best Romance.

hunger.name: The Hunger Games
hunger.description: In the ruins of North America lies the nation of Panem, a shining Capitol surrounded by twelve outlying districts.

harry.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry.description: A hero's mission,not just in Harry's quest for the Horcruxes, but in his journey from boy to man.
